/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
